reviewText: I have shown this to small groups in a church setting and to a large audience in a retirement center. WELL RECEIVED in both. This is a thought-provoking, touching, discussion-starting presentation. Timeless.

It is a wonderful film, however as one who teaches on the subject, the testimonies were very touching, but there was not much on the "how" to forgive.  I would still encourage people to watch this film because it will still touch you and challenge you to pursue forgiveness.
